sn43.1:2.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitaṁ vo mayā asaṅkhataṁ, desito asaṅkhatagāmimaggo.
sn43.1:2.2: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, satthārā karaṇīyaṁ sāvakānaṁ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṁ upādāya, kataṁ vo taṁ mayā.
sn43.1:2.3: Etāni, bhikkhave, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññāgārāni. Jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamādattha; mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. Ayaṁ vo amhākaṁ anusāsanī”ti.
sn43.3:1.2: Savitakkasavicāro samādhi, avitakkavicāramatto samādhi, avitakkaavicāro samādhi—ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43.4:1.2: Suññato samādhi, animitto samādhi, appaṇihito samādhi—ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43.5:1.2: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā. Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43.6:1.2: Cattāro sammappadhānā. Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43.7:1.2: Cattāro iddhipādā. Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43.9:1.2: Pañca balāni. Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43.10:1.2: Satta bojjhaṅgā. Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43.11:1.4: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitaṁ vo mayā asaṅkhataṁ, desito asaṅkhatagāmimaggo.
sn43.11:1.5: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, satthārā karaṇīyaṁ sāvakānaṁ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṁ upādāya kataṁ vo taṁ mayā.
sn43.11:1.6: Etāni, bhikkhave, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññāgārāni. Jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamādattha; mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. Ayaṁ vo amhākaṁ anusāsanī”ti.
sn43.12:1.9: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitaṁ vo mayā asaṅkhataṁ, desito asaṅkhatagāmimaggo.
sn43.12:1.10: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, satthārā karaṇīyaṁ sāvakānaṁ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṁ upādāya, kataṁ vo taṁ mayā.
sn43.12:1.11: Etāni, bhikkhave, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññāgārāni. Jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamādattha; mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. Ayaṁ vo amhākaṁ anusāsanīti.
sn43.12:2.1: Asaṅkhatañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi asaṅkhatagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.12:2.9: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitaṁ vo mayā asaṅkhataṁ …pe…
sn43.12:3.8: Avitakko avicāro samādhi. Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43.12:4.8: Appaṇihito samādhi. Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43.12:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
sn43.12:5.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati …pe…
sn43.12:5.8: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu citte cittānupassī viharati …pe…
sn43.12:5.11: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati …pe… ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43.12:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anuppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ anuppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
sn43.12:6.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannānaṁ pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
sn43.12:6.8: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anuppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ uppādāya chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti padahati.
sn43.12:6.11_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannānaṁ kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya
sn43.12:6.11_1: vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṁ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṁ ārabhati cittaṁ paggaṇhāti
sn43.12:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti.
sn43.12:7.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti.
sn43.12:7.8: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti.
sn43.12:7.11: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vīmaṁsasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti. Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43.12:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhindriyaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn43.12:8.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vīriyindriyaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ …pe…
sn43.12:8.14: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paññindriyaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ. Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43.12:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhābalaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ …pe…
sn43.12:9.14: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paññābalaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ. Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43.12:10.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ …pe…
sn43.12:10.10: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ. Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43.12:11.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn43.12:11.11: asaṅkhatañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi asaṅkhatagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.12:11.15: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammāsamādhiṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
sn43.12:11.17: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitaṁ vo mayā asaṅkhataṁ, desito asaṅkhatagāmimaggo.
sn43.12:11.18: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, satthārā karaṇīyaṁ sāvakānaṁ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṁ upādāya, kataṁ vo taṁ mayā.
sn43.12:11.19: Etāni, bhikkhave, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññāgārāni. Jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamādattha; mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. Ayaṁ vo amhākaṁ anusāsanī”ti.
sn43.15:1.1: Saccañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi saccagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.16:1.1: Pārañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi pāragāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.17:1.1: Nipuṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi nipuṇagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.18:1.1: Sududdasañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sududdasagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.19:1.1: Ajajjarañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi ajajjaragāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.20:1.1: Dhuvañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi dhuvagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.21:1.1: Apalokitañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi apalokitagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.22:1.1: Anidassanañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anidassanagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.23:1.1: Nippapañcañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi nippapañcagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.24:1.1: Santañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi santagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.25:1.1: Amatañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi amatagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.26:1.1: Paṇītañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi paṇītagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.27:1.1: Sivañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sivagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.28:1.1: Khemañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi khemagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.29:1.1: Taṇhākkhayañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi taṇhākkhayagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.30:1.1: Acchariyañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi acchariyagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.31:1.1: Abbhutañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi abbhutagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.32:1.1: Anītikañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anītikagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.33:1.1: Anītikadhammañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anītikadhammagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.34:1.1: Nibbānañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi nibbānagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.35:1.1: Abyābajjhañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi abyābajjhagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.36:1.1: Virāgañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi virāgagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.37:1.1: Suddhiñca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi suddhigāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.37:1.2: Taṁ suṇātha. Katamā ca, bhikkhave, suddhi …pe….
sn43.38:1.1: Muttiñca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi muttigāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.38:1.2: Taṁ suṇātha. Katamā ca, bhikkhave, mutti …pe….
sn43.39:1.1: Anālayañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anālayagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.39:1.2: Taṁ suṇātha. Katamo ca, bhikkhave, anālayo …pe….
sn43.40:1.1: Dīpañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi dīpagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.41:1.1: Leṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi leṇagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.42:1.1: Tāṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi tāṇagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.43:1.1: Saraṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi saraṇagāmiñca maggaṁ.
sn43.44:1.9: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitaṁ vo mayā parāyanaṁ, desito parāyanagāmimaggo.
sn43.44:1.10: Yaṁ, bhikkhave, satthārā karaṇīyaṁ sāvakānaṁ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṁ upādāya, kataṁ vo taṁ mayā.
sn43.44:1.11: Etāni, bhikkhave, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññāgārāni. Jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamādattha; mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. Ayaṁ vo amhākaṁ anusāsanī”ti.
